title: Learning Strategy Development Through Remote Education Network Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Basic network analysis concepts and experience in educational administration
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented education using VR simulations in smartphone-based limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can visualize and interpret trends in distance education research using citation network analysis tools.
Learners can propose strategies to enhance organizational education plans based on network analysis results.
Learners can identify core nodes (authors/institutions/journals) in distance education networks within a VR simulation environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
